Infectum.turoyo: šawʕo=niše ko-layši w šawʕo ko-ǧəġri at=tanure w šawʕo ko-duqi -
translations: sieben Weiber kneten Teig, sieben heizen die Backöfen, sieben kleben die Brotfladen an

tokens.value: ʻsieben Weiber kneten Teig, sieben heizen die Backöfen, sieben kleben die Brotfladen anʼ

Infectum.text: šawʕo=niše ko-layši, w šawʕo ko-ǧəġri at=tanure, w šawʕo ko-duqi ʻsieben Weiber kneten Teig, sieben heizen die Backöfen, sieben kleben die Brotfladen anʼ; 454; 73/258-259;

Infectum.turoyo: zəbṭina-lan bayto bas-yo fayšina b-u=tanur-awo k-oṯən an=noše hul d-ko-duqi kmo dawqe d-laḥmo haka nafəl gazguzo mede mḥalqi-li-yo xd-u=kalbo d-oxan-ne haw ko-maqbanno ono u=med-ano g-əzzi d-zobaṭn-i bayto
translations: ‘We shall rent ourselves a house. We shall no longer stay in that bakehouse (lit. ‘stove’

tokens.value: zəbṭina-lan bayto bas-yo fayšina b-u=tanur-awo k-oṯən an=noše hul d-ko-duqi kmo dawqe d-laḥmo haka nafəl gazguzo mede mḥalqi-li-yo xd-u=kalbo d-oxan-ne haw ko-maqbanno ono u=med-ano g-əzzi d-zobaṭn-i bayto
‘We shall rent ourselves a house. We shall no longer stay in that bakehouse (lit. ‘stove’

Infectum.text: zəbṭina-lan bayto bas-yo fayšina b-u=tanur-awo k-oṯən an=noše hul d-ko-duqi kmo dawqe d-laḥmo haka nafəl gazguzo mede mḥalqi-li-yo xd-u=kalbo d-oxan-ne haw ko-maqbanno ono u=med-ano g-əzzi d-zobaṭn-i bayto ‘We shall rent ourselves a house. We shall no longer stay in that bakehouse (lit. ‘stove’)

Infectum.turoyo: . People come there to bake a couple of flatbreads. And if a piece of a flatbread falls down they throw it to me like like I am some dog and should eat it. I shall no longer accept this! I shall go and get myself a house!’ -

tokens.value: to bake a couple of flatbreads. And if a piece
they throw it to me like like I am some dog and should eat it. I shall no longer accept this! I shall go and get myself a house!’

Infectum.text: . People come (there) to bake a couple of flatbreads. And if a piece (of a flatbread) falls down, they throw it to me like like I am some dog and should eat it. I shall no longer accept this! I shall go and get myself a house!’ 77/196-197;

label_gloss_tokens.text: den Teig für das Fladenbrot an der Innenseite des Backofens festkleben, Fladenbrot backen;
